value.title: Create Line Chart with Dual Y Axis in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, how we can create a line chart with the dual Y-axis in Power BI.  This feature has been rolled out in March 2020 Power BI Desktop Update.  Here, first, we will learn how we can create a normal Line Chart and then add second Y-axis to represent the Sales data by Units with

value.title: DAX for Power BI - Calculate Cumulative Sum (Running Total) of Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: The cumulative total is also known as Running total and during this video, we will talk about how we can calculate a cumulative sum for request count using Power BI Dax measure in Power BI.  During this session, we will cover the following things: • Real-life example where we need Cumulative Sum 00:21

value.excerpt: Welcome to my new series – “Wednesday with DAX”. This is the first video of this series. value.title: Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API
value.excerpt: The Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API allow you to quickly inventory your organization and manage workspaces and access.
